column4: I am getting an Errot 17 on boot 1ith 8.10 just after grub.  Has anyone had this error and know how to fix it.  I have a Sata hard disk.
im confuse, just seems like a basic mbr issue
i think the hard disk is faulty as it clicks every now and then.  bit alot of the threads point to grub or mbr being the problem
sure but that doesnt explain why usb doesnt work
what's usb got to do with it im running a sata hard disk
